<!-- Code generated by generrordocs.go; DO NOT EDIT. -->

```
MisplacedTypeParam occurs when a type parameter is used in a place where
it is not permitted.

Example:
 type T[P any] P

Example:
 type T[P any] struct{ *P }
```
